results.title: A prospective clinical trial comparing the treatment of idiopathic membranous nephropathy and nephrotic syndrome with simvastatin and diet, versus diet alone.
results.text_hl: A prospective clinical trial comparing the treatment of @<m>DISEASE_Glomerulonephritis_Membranous</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015433 @@@idiopathic membranous nephropathy@@@ and @DISEASE_Nephrotic_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D009404 @@@nephrotic syndrome@@@ with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and diet, versus diet alone.

citations.NLM: Rayner BL, Byrne MJ, van Zyl Smit R. A prospective clinical trial comparing the treatment of idiopathic membranous nephropathy and nephrotic syndrome with simvastatin and diet, versus diet alone. Clin Nephrol. 1996 Oct;46(4):219-24. PMID: 8905205
citations.BibTeX: @article{8905205, title={A prospective clinical trial comparing the treatment of idiopathic membranous nephropathy and nephrotic syndrome with simvastatin and diet, versus diet alone.}, author={Rayner BL and Byrne MJ and van Zyl Smit R}, journal={Clin Nephrol}, volume={46}, number={4}, pages={219-24}}

results.title: Effect of combining ACE inhibitor and statin in severe experimental nephropathy.
results.text_hl: Up-regulation of @GENE_CCL2 @GENE_24770 @@@monocyte chemoattractant protein-1@@@ (@GENE_CCL2 @GENE_24770 @@@MCP-1@@@) mRNA in @<m>DISEASE_Glomerulonephritis_Membranous</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015433 @@@PHN@@@ kidneys was not affected by @CHEMICAL_Lisinopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@, it was inhibited by 30% after @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, and almost completely normalized by @CHEMICAL_Lisinopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ plus @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@.

citations.NLM: Zoja C, Corna D, Rottoli D, Cattaneo D, Zanchi C, Tomasoni S, Abbate M, Remuzzi G. Effect of combining ACE inhibitor and statin in severe experimental nephropathy. Kidney Int. 2002 May;61(5):1635-45. PMID: 11967013
citations.BibTeX: @article{11967013, title={Effect of combining ACE inhibitor and statin in severe experimental nephropathy.}, author={Zoja C and Corna D and Rottoli D and Cattaneo D and Zanchi C and Tomasoni S and Abbate M and Remuzzi G}, journal={Kidney Int}, volume={61}, number={5}, pages={1635-45}}

results.title: Simvastatin triggers mitochondria-induced Ca2+ signaling alteration in skeletal muscle.
results.text_hl: In addition, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ increased mitochondrial @CHEMICAL_NAD @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009243 @@@NADH@@@ content and induced @<m>DISEASE_Glomerulonephritis_Membranous</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015433 @@@mitochondrial membrane depolarization@@@ (EC(50)=1.96 microM) suggesting an altered mitochondrial function.

citations.NLM: Sirvent P, Mercier J, Vassort G, Lacampagne A. Simvastatin triggers mitochondria-induced Ca2+ signaling alteration in skeletal muscle. Biochem Biophys Res Commun. 2005 Apr 15;329(3):1067-75. PMID: 15752763
citations.BibTeX: @article{15752763, title={Simvastatin triggers mitochondria-induced Ca2+ signaling alteration in skeletal muscle.}, author={Sirvent P and Mercier J and Vassort G and Lacampagne A}, journal={Biochem Biophys Res Commun}, volume={329}, number={3}, pages={1067-75}}

results.title: Electrical myotonia of rabbit skeletal muscles by HMG-CoA reductase inhibitors.
results.text_hl: In normal muscles perfused with a solution containing the inhibitors, both @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Pravastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017035 @@@pravastatin@@@ produced @<m>DISEASE_Glomerulonephritis_Membranous</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015433 @@@membrane@@@ hyperexcitability with repetitive firing similar to that seen in @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@-administered @SPECIES_9986 @@@rabbits@@@.

citations.NLM: Sonoda Y, Gotow T, Kuriyama M, Nakahara K, Arimura K, Osame M. Electrical myotonia of rabbit skeletal muscles by HMG-CoA reductase inhibitors. Muscle Nerve. 1994 Aug;17(8):891-7. PMID: 8041396
citations.BibTeX: @article{8041396, title={Electrical myotonia of rabbit skeletal muscles by HMG-CoA reductase inhibitors.}, author={Sonoda Y and Gotow T and Kuriyama M and Nakahara K and Arimura K and Osame M}, journal={Muscle Nerve}, volume={17}, number={8}, pages={891-7}}

results.title: Simvastatin attenuates oxidant-induced mitochondrial dysfunction in cardiac myocytes.
results.text_hl: This effect was inhibited by the nitric oxide synthase inhibitor @CHEMICAL_NG_Nitroarginine_Methyl_Ester @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019331 @@@NG-nitro-L-arginine methyl ester@@@ (@CHEMICAL_NG_Nitroarginine_Methyl_Ester @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019331 @@@L-NAME@@@) or the ATP-sensitive mitochondrial potassium channel (mitoKATP) blocker @CHEMICAL_5_hydroxydecanoic_acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:C052853 @@@5-hydroxydecanoate@@@. @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ attenuates @<m>DISEASE_Glomerulonephritis_Membranous</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015433 @@@mitochondrial membrane depolarization@@@ after exposure to oxidant stress.

citations.NLM: Jones SP, Teshima Y, Akao M, Marbán E. Simvastatin attenuates oxidant-induced mitochondrial dysfunction in cardiac myocytes. Circ Res. 2003 Oct 17;93(8):697-9. PMID: 14512440
citations.BibTeX: @article{14512440, title={Simvastatin attenuates oxidant-induced mitochondrial dysfunction in cardiac myocytes.}, author={Jones SP and Teshima Y and Akao M and Marbán E}, journal={Circ Res}, volume={93}, number={8}, pages={697-9}}

results.title: Ongoing clinical trials of lipid reduction therapy in patients with renal disease.
results.text_hl: Small uncontrolled studies show that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Probucol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011341 @@@probucol@@@ moderately reduce @DISEASE_Proteinuria @DISEASE_MESH:D011507 @@@proteinuria@@@ among @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Glomerulonephritis_Membranous</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015433 @@@membranous nephropathy@@@.

citations.NLM: Yukawa S, Mune M, Yamada Y, Otani H, Kishino M, Tone Y. Ongoing clinical trials of lipid reduction therapy in patients with renal disease. Kidney Int Suppl. 1999 Jul;71():S141-3. PMID: 10412759
citations.BibTeX: @article{10412759, title={Ongoing clinical trials of lipid reduction therapy in patients with renal disease.}, author={Yukawa S and Mune M and Yamada Y and Otani H and Kishino M and Tone Y}, journal={Kidney Int Suppl}, volume={71}, pages={S141-3}}
